meanings.definition: A genetic disorder characterized by the growth of tumors along nerves in the skin, brain, and other parts of the body.
meanings.sent1: Neurofibromatosis can cause tumors to develop on nerves in the body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying ways to treat neurofibromatosis effectively.
meanings.sent3: The neurofibromatosis in the story made the character's nerves seem like a busy highway.
meanings.sent4: Her neurofibromatosis of worries grew like tangled vines in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The image of neurofibromatosis spreading along nerves is both fascinating and frightening.
